original_text: At that time, Israel's strong cities will be empty. People will run away from those cities, as the Amorites ran away from the hills when the Israelites attacked them. Israel's strong cities will become heaps of stones.
korean_text: 그 날에 그 견고한 성읍들이 옛적에 이스라엘 자손 앞에서 버린 바 된 수풀 속의 처소와 작은 산 꼭대기의 처소 같아서 황폐하리니

sentences.original_text: Israel's strong cities will be empty
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘의 견고한 성읍들이 황폐하게 될 것이라

sentences.original_text: People will run away from those cities
as the Amorites ran away from the hills
Israel's strong cities will become heaps of stones
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘의 견고한 성읍들은 돌 무더기가 될 것이라
